_comment_1: === COPY ANNOTATE - STATIC ANNOTATION COPIER CONFIG ===
_comment_2: Copies annotations for static screen elements (HUD, etc.) to all images
_comment_master_dir: Directory containing classes.txt and the master annotation .txt file to copy from
_comment_labels_dir: Directory where annotation .txt files will be created/updated
_comment_classes_to_copy: List of class names to copy from master annotation. Must match names in classes.txt exactly
